section.title: iBATIS/Java 2.0.8 available
section.p: [26-Nov-2004] Under the new release plan, Team Java will be alternating between bug fix releases and feature releases. Version 2.0.8 is a bug fix release, and therefore the next release will be a feature release. This approach will keep the product stable while offering power users access to new features earlier and on a more consistent release schedule.

ul.li: Probes now always return true for hasReadable/hasWriteable property checks.
Fixed OUT/INOUT parameters to proc not retrieved properly (ibatis-12)
Verified missing columns throw an exception (ibatis-16)
Completely $supplied$ SQL statements are not supported (ibatis-17)
Verified parameter type handlers are applied (ibatis-ll)
Fixed cache model size of 1 disables caching (ibatis-7)
Added commitRequired attribute to transactionManager to force commit even on query (ibatis-10,3)

section.title: New version of sql2ibatis available
section.p: [26-Nov-2004] Alex Egorov has released a new version of his iBATIS configuration and SQL generation tool. It generates configuration files and SQL based on an input DDL file. Check it out.

section.title: Happy Halloween from iBATIS and The Apache Software Foundation
section.p: [31 Oct 2004] iBATIS has been voted into the Apache Incubator, and a number of resources have been set up. Over the next few weeks, we'll be switching over our current SourceForge resources over to Apache.
